definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I have survived over 40 years of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 我大病不死已經超過了40多個年頭。

sentences.english: Abducted or out ill, or dead at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 被擄者或大病而出，或亡于山下。

sentences.english: If you are not carefull, you could finish up seriously ill.
sentences.chinese: 要是不注意，你可能到頭了會大病一場。

sentences.english: I have decided not to choose any one of those two people. A bad illness really made more things clearer to me.
sentences.chinese: 我已經決定兩個人都不選，一場大病令我明白了很多。

sentences.english: Estimates of catastrophic spending from the two measures were also compared.
sentences.chinese: 還要比較兩個指標的大病治療開支估值。

sentences.english: About twenty days after the wedding, his wife died of illness. Sun was extremely sad.
sentences.chinese: 婚後二十天妻子得一場大病去世，公子十分悲傷。

sentences.english: My boss told me to go home. He sais I looked like death warmed over.
sentences.chinese: 老闆叫我回家，他說我看起來像害了大病似的。

sentences.english: He was never terribly sick, but he always thought he was.
sentences.chinese: 他從來沒什麼大病，但他總認爲自己重病纏身。

sentences.english: When recovering from a serious illness, you have to nourish your body well.
sentences.chinese: 大病初癒，你要好好營養一下身體。

sentences.english: He has had a bad illness,but he is better now.
sentences.chinese: 他得了一場大病，可是現在好多了。

sentences.english: His last illness nearly finished him off.
sentences.chinese: 上次那場大病幾乎要了他的命。

sentences.english: This severe bout of illness has done serious damage to his health.
sentences.chinese: 這場大病損傷了他的體力。

sentences.english: Although he was not suffering from a serious illness, it was not unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他沒犯什麼大病，但他的離去也是在意料之中的。

sentences.english: I met a friend in the street; he said he had been seriously ill.
sentences.chinese: 我在街上遇見了一位朋友，他說他生過一場大病。

sentences.english: He didn't feel up to going such a long way after his recent illness.
sentences.chinese: 大病初癒，他覺得自己沒有這個能力走這麼長的路。

sentences.english: He was skeletonized after a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 一場大病後，他瘦得只剩下了一把骨頭。

definition: to fall ill/to contract a disease
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
to fall ill/to be stricken with an illness
